TopicTitle: KAS Help fixing docking port in space.

Articles.Content: Using Kolonization, I mounted two docking ports the wrong way around on a 6 port hub. It's already in space, and I've tried removing and reattaching the port the other way around, but it won't attach to structure once I've turned it around. Any ideas?
I don't think KAS lets you flip parts in place once they have been attached. When you dismount them try placing them somewhere else if you can and then move them again to the desired location.
Yes it does. The problem is that you're probably using the wrench instead of the screwdriver. The wrench only keys your disassemble parts or attach radial parts. The screwdriver does everything.
